description: Seven-theme ESG maturity rubric (0–4) aligned with ESG Doc; designed for MCP + Iceberg scoring agent.
name: ESG Maturity Scoring Rubric

themes.intent: Evaluate ambition, structure, and credibility of targets.
themes.name: Target Setting & Planning

0.descriptor: No targets or vague qualitative commitments.
0.label: No targets

1.descriptor: Short‑term qualitative or partial quantitative targets.
1.label: Short‑term qualitative or partial quantitative targets

2.descriptor: Time‑bound quantitative targets with disclosed baseline year, scope coverage, and KPIs.
2.label: Time‑bound quantitative targets with disclosed baseline year, scope coverage, and KPIs

3.descriptor: Science‑based methodology or SBTi submission; scenario modeling present but not financially linked; supplier engagement.
3.label: Science‑based methodology or SBTi submission; scenario modeling present but not financially linked; supplier engagement

4.descriptor: Validated science‑based targets (SBTi or equivalent); financial integration (CAPEX/OPEX linkage); scenario planning embedded in enterprise strategy.
4.label: Validated science‑based targets (SBTi or equivalent); financial integration (CAPEX/OPEX linkage); scenario planning embedded in enterprise strategy

themes.intent: Evaluate ESG integration within operations and governance.
themes.name: Operational Structure & Processes

2.descriptor: Formalized processes, roles, and documented policies.
2.label: Formalized

3.descriptor: Cross‑functional collaboration with clear KPIs, accountability, and oversight.
3.label: Cross‑functional collaboration with clear KPIs, accountability, and oversight

4.descriptor: Fully embedded ESG management system with internal audit, continuous improvement, and integrated financial risk controls.
4.label: Fully embedded ESG management system with internal audit, continuous improvement, and integrated financial risk controls

themes.intent: Assess data quality, automation, and system architecture.
themes.name: Data Maturity

0.descriptor: Manual, inconsistent data entry; no governance.
0.label: Manual

1.descriptor: Structured but manual data collection; limited validation.
1.label: Structured but manual data collection; limited validation

2.descriptor: Partially automated collection; standardized formats; QA protocols.
2.label: Partially automated

3.descriptor: Centralized database with integration across functions; periodic audits; supplier data exchange.
3.label: Centralized database with integration across functions; periodic audits; supplier data exchange

4.descriptor: Automated pipelines with real‑time validation, lineage tracking, and integrated reporting systems (e.g., Iceberg, Parquet architecture).
4.label: Automated pipelines with real‑time validation, lineage tracking, and integrated reporting systems (e

themes.intent: Evaluate completeness, accuracy, and assurance of emissions data.
themes.name: GHG Accounting

2.descriptor: Scope 1/2 complete; partial Scope 3 with standard factors; recalculation policy.
2.label: Scope 1/2 complete; partial Scope 3 with standard factors; recalculation policy

3.descriptor: Comprehensive Scope 1/2/3 with data improvement plans, supplier engagement, and limited assurance.
3.label: Comprehensive

4.descriptor: Full third‑party reasonable assurance; GHG Protocol compliance; uncertainty analysis; auditor verification.
4.label: Reasonable assurance

themes.intent: Measure transparency, alignment, and timeliness of ESG reporting.
themes.name: Reporting & Disclosure

1.descriptor: CSR/GRI index partial coverage; narrative only.
1.label: CSR/GRI index partial coverage; narrative only

3.descriptor: Cross‑framework KPI alignment; dual materiality; investor reporting consistency.
3.label: Cross‑framework KPI alignment; dual materiality; investor reporting consistency

4.descriptor: External assurance; digital tagging (XBRL/ESRS); integrated financial filing; near‑real‑time reporting.
4.label: External assurance; digital tagging (XBRL/ESRS); integrated financial filing; near‑real‑time reporting

themes.intent: Evaluate monitoring, optimization, and forecasting of energy and resource use.
themes.name: Energy Intelligence

2.descriptor: Systematic KPIs and improvement projects tracked.
2.label: Systematic KPIs and improvement projects tracked

3.descriptor: Automated monitoring and analytics; predictive maintenance; integration with ESG data.
3.label: Automated monitoring and analytics; predictive maintenance; integration with ESG data

4.descriptor: AI/ML forecasting; optimization across assets; cost‑benefit analysis tied to decarbonization strategy.
4.label: AI/ML forecasting; optimization across assets; cost‑benefit analysis tied to decarbonization strategy

themes.intent: Evaluate climate/ESG risk identification and mitigation integration.
themes.name: Risk Management & Mitigation

0.descriptor: No risk framework or ESG integration.
0.label: No risk framework or ESG integration

2.descriptor: Defined risk taxonomy; periodic assessments; basic mitigation plans.
2.label: Defined risk taxonomy; periodic assessments; basic mitigation plans

3.descriptor: Quantified risk assessments (transition/physical); scenario testing; integrated into planning.
3.label: Integrated

4.descriptor: Enterprise risk integrated with financial modeling; insured/uninsured analysis; public disclosure per ISSB/CSRD.
4.label: Enterprise risk integrated with financial modeling; insured/uninsured analysis; public disclosure per ISSB/CSRD
